cells.source:
# Employee Data Analysis
Complete ETL pipeline with employee, dept, salgrade, and location tables

# Load employee data
import pandas as pd
employee_df = pd.read_json('test_data_e2e/employee.json')
employee_df.head()

# Check for PII
from neurolake.compliance import detect_pii
pii_columns = detect_pii(employee_df)
print(f'PII columns found: {pii_columns}')

# Join with department
dept_df = pd.read_json('test_data_e2e/dept.json')
result = employee_df.merge(dept_df, on='dept_id')
result.head()
